article.Heading: GST anti-climax: Moviegoers stay away from theatres
article.Summary: The goods and services tax prompted cinema theatres across Tamil Nadu to hike ticket prices for the first time in over a decade. That has not worked out well for these establishments. CNBC-TV18's Jude Sannith gave us this report.
article.Body:
The goods and services tax prompted cinema theatres across Tamil Nadu to hike ticket prices for the first time in over a decade. That has not worked out well for these establishments. CNBC-TV18's Jude Sannith gave us this report.
